Alert Name: bush
Wolfowitz decision gets pushed back
The fate of the World Bank president accused of inappropriately promoting his girlfriend has been delayed until next week.
04/20/07 03:47 PM, EDT
The fate of World Bank President Paul Wolfowitz will be determined next week when a bank committee reports on whether a promotion he approved for his girlfriend was properly handled, sources said Friday.
